trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event occurs when a control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>evento ocorre quando um controle é redesenhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>

trans-unit.source: A PaintEventArgs specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> to use to paint the control and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A> in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um PaintEventArgs o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A>a ser usado para pintar o controle e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A>no qual a pintura.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o modelo de evento, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified graphics and clipping rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o gráfico especificado e o retângulo de recorte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> identified by the `graphics` parameter is disposed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>identificado pelo `graphics` parâmetro é descartado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>é descartado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usado para pintar o item.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the rectangle in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa o retângulo na qual a pintura.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo na qual a pintura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> no qual a pintura.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar Dispose quando terminar de usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método Dispose deixa a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>em um estado inutilizável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>estava ocupando.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada Dispose antes de liberar sua última referência a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público `Dispose()` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca o método Dispose protegido com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto tente liberar recursos e executar outras operações de limpeza antes que ela é recuperada pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics used to paint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os elementos gráficos usados para pintar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to paint.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto usado para pintar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object provides methods for drawing objects on the display device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto fornece métodos para desenhar objetos no dispositivo de vídeo.
